Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hero's Path[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength when attacking wounded enemy units.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Crown Loyalty[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Global Happiness and +15% higher chance to find enemy spies.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Military Parade[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Global Happiness for each Military Unit.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Leader's Oath[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness for every Monument. Receive a free Policy of your choice.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Peasant's Path[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food per city and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness for each Granary .
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]New Strategies[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Purchasing items in cities costs 10% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Organized Settlement[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]New cities begin with two extra [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Working Class[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Mines yield +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and cities yield an additional +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Golden Realm[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for every city and you immediately enter a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Productive Society[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every city.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Old Ways[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on Mines and +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food on Farms.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Religious Law[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each Great Person improvement.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Imperial Cult[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Global Happiness and +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each city.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Religious Work[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each [ICON_GREAT_PERSON] Specialist and +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each Great Work.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Religious Ideologies[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Religious pressure in your Holy City is doubled and + 1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for each Burial Mound.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Specialist Trader[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each Trading Post and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Specialist.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Foreign Deals[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each city and all [ICON_CAPITAL] Capitals on the map are revealed.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ecological Research[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_SPECIALIST]Specialists consume 50% less [ICON_FOOD] Food and gain +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for every 10 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in a city.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Public Research[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for each city and +3 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital .
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cultural Research[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Academies yield +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and immediately enter a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Golden Dream[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]50% of [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness is added to your [ICON_RESEARCH] Science each turn.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Art Community[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each city.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Art Monument[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides a free [ICON_CULTURE] Cultural building in each of your own cities.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Art Tourism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for every World Wonder and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each Trading Post.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Modern Art[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for every [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Specialist and immediately begins a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hansa[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Merchant and allows Great Merchants to annex City-States.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]New Hope[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]One free Social Policy and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each Trade Route.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]New Colonies[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Settlers in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]New Era[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness. Receive +100 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism when a Great Admiral is born.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]New Live[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each Fishing Boat and Trade Missions earn +25% more [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Touristic Travel[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Merchant generation and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each Hotel.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Trade Union[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and +10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold for [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Charismatic Patron[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each City and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for every unit garrisoned in a city.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Golden Patron[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each Trading Post and begins a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]New Deals[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each Trade Route.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Order Trade[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each City [ICON_CONNECTED] connected to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Order Militia[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each unit garrisoned in a city.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Order Annexation[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Allows you to annex City-States and Trading Posts yield +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]New Order[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +1% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for each Specialist, +5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and +5 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]General Order[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] two Great Generals appairs near your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and Great Generals generation is doubled.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]National Wonders[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Adds +5 yields [ICON_GOLD] Gold and + 2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture to each World Wonder you own.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Order Trade[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for every 5 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in a city
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Free Society[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +10% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People generation in all cities and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for every surplus Luxury Resource.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Human Society[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +25% [ICON_FOOD] Food in all cities and [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages are +50% longer.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Trading Corporations[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Trade Missions and Trading Posts yield +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Side Seeings[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Adds +1 yield [ICON_HAPPINESS] Happiness to each of World Wonders you own.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Global Great Works[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Adds +5 yield [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture to every Great Work you own.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Collective Constructer[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Cost of purchasing items in cities require 50% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Collective Constructer[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each Trade Route and +5 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Organized Structure[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from each Trading Post,+3 [ICON_FOOD] Food from each Farm and +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from each Mine
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Social Pact[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE] -15% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappines for the number of Cities you control.

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Naval Tradition[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Great Merchant are +25% appairing rate and +1 Gold in every City you own.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Naval Tradition[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from each Harbor, Seaport, Lighthouse and Dock.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Merchant Navy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from each Harbor, Seaport, Lighthouse and Dock.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Artistic Genuis[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides one free [ICON_GREAT_PERSON] Artist and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture forme each Spezialist.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Scientific Revolution[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides two free Technologies.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Secularism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for each Spezialist and you get one extra vote in the World Congress.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Secularism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each research Buildings and one extra Citizen in each of your Cities.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Military Tradition[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Military units get +50% faster experience and each of your Cities get a [ICON_STRENTGH] defense bonus.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Maritime Infrastructure[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides two extra Trade Routes and +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in each City onm a coast.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Legalism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides two extra Trade Routes and 15% [ICON_FOOD] Food is saved in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital when a new Citizen is born.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Consulates[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides one extra Spy and resting point for [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all City-States is increased by 20.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Collective Rule[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Settlers in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Caravans[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2[ICON_GOLD] Gold for every Land Trade Route and Pastures yield +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Trade Unions[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-50% [ICON_GOLD] Gold maintenance costs for Roads and Railroads and Pastures yield +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Humanism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+25% generation of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Scientists and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for each Lumbermill
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Organized religion[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2[ICON_PEACE] Faith for each Temple and Shrine and Missionaries build in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital get one extra religion spread.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides +5[ICON_PEACE] Faith in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. Piety is best to get an early Religion.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Liberty[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A free Settler appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each city. Liberty is best for quick expansion.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Honor[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A free Warrior appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each Barbarian killed. Honor is best for military dominance.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tradition[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1[ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. Tradition is the best for a small Civilisation.
